thread.title: TW from Virginia
thread.title_full: willisorchards.com reviewed by TW from Virginia

author: TW from Virginia
title: TW from Virginia
text: I found green gage plum trees at Willis Orchards just by surfing the net, because the many catalogs i had did not offer that type of plum tree. All the trees i received are as discribed by Willis is accurate and healthy. Also orderd some bamoo from Willis, that i planted this fall of 2016 and do to the mild winter in VA it is already shooting up from the ground in December of 2016. Do to the great product i received from Willis Orchards i feel confident i will do more business with these people. Thanks
